attributes.action: refuse free medical treatment to non EU citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to urge all politicians to introduce statute that requires all persons entering the UK to have full medical insurance before entry to the uk is allowed. It would also require all immigrants and their families to the UK to have private medical insurance and contribute to the economy of the UK for the minimum of 5 years before the use of the NHS facilities on a "free" basis is allowed.
The basis of this petition is to greatly ease the unsustainable strain on this countries health services by persons who do not contribute to it.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions around this subject already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
